title: When It Raynes
description: An erotic tale of love, secrets, and deceit. Love is such a beautiful thing when shared between the right people. Rayne and David Smith were the epitome of a strong marriage filled with love. Rayne, a prestige real estate agent, and David, a bank branch manager, had a foundation built not only on love but commitment, balance, dedication, and honesty. Unfortunately their comfortable bubble is disturbed when Rayneâ€™s mother passes and she returns home for the funeral. Her past quickly enters her present and can possibly shatter her future. Secrets are revealed and lines are crossed. Can Rayne and David recover from scandals of the past?
author: J. Asmara
